description.value:
A mechanical songbird in a cage that makes soothing sounds. In the event of a Gellar Field failiure, will shriek loudly 1d10 Rounds prior to the failiure or fluctuation. Will also do this if within 10 metres of a warp Entity or Daemon (although not guaranteed if they can hide their presence).

Requirements

A Rare Archeotech Item, They are Good Craftsmanship by default, with no Poor or Common Craftsmanship versions. (if there are, they're probably fake)

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
